short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upvotes All Products On The Product Hunt Homepage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Product Hunt upvoter is the quickest and easiest way to instantly upvote all products on the Product Hunt homepage.

By upvoting other peoples' products, they will be more likely to return an upvote for your product hunt listings.

To use, simply go to www.producthunt.com and then click the "Upvote Now" button below.

UPDATES (Version 1.1) - Shows loading image when upvoting process is going on.
